body:
The environment variable CASSANDRA_DATACENTER: https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/38c51a43be1c678820d5e62b68442bf5035e161b/tools/cassandra/main.go#L112

Is hidden by subcommand flags with the same name, e.g., create.

An implication is that, no way can we use autosetup:https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/b3b3e7b5ada768a122cd383ed7d28b6383a1d217/docker/start.sh#L29
 with that environment variable.
